plugin.name: DynMap
plugin.info: A Google Maps-like map for your Minecraft server that can be viewed in a browser.

plugin.name: ClearLag
plugin.info: This plugin is made for small servers to big servers, it's made to remove all entities to prevent/clear lag.

plugin.name: WorldEdit
plugin.info: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer

plugin.name: Essentials
plugin.info: Essentials offers over 100 commands and features useful on just about every server.

plugin.name: PermissionsEx
plugin.info: PermissionsEx (PEX) is a new permissions plugin, based on Permissions ideas and supports all of its features.

plugin.name: Factions
plugin.info: This plugin allows you to create your own faction. The more followers a faction has the more land the faction can claim.

plugin.name: WorldGuard
plugin.info: WorldGuard is a powerful plugin providing all the little things (and some big ones), and it protects your servers from various problems.

plugin.name: AntiCheat
plugin.info: AntiCheat helps server admins easily identify and block malicious users by monitoring and analyzing the behavior of your players.

plugin.name: mcMMO
plugin.info: The goal of mcMMO is to take core Minecraft game mechanics and expand them into add an extensive and quality RPG experience.

plugin.name: MobHealth
plugin.info: This simple but invaluable plugin lets you know the damage you just caused to a mob (including other players), and how much health it has left.
